tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE anomaly_detection_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    value DOUBLE PRECISION
)

CREATE TABLE anomaly_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES anomaly_events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    value DECIMAL,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE anomalies (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    anomaly_type VARCHAR(50),
    anomaly_description TEXT,
    anomaly_score FLOAT,
    detection_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE anomaly_history (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    anomaly_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    resolution_status BOOLEAN,
    resolved_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE data_sources_history (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    data_source_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action VARCHAR(20),
    user_id UUID
);
